Hello Giffy and welcome!

I'm filling in as "list mom"  and I've checked with the group's founder 
affectionately known to us as Phil .  Archiving doujinshi poses a bit of 
a problem in two ways--space limits in the photos/files section and also 
since doujinshi is a form of fanfiction  the author's permission would 
be needed.

We can handle some screencaps in the "photos" section but again space is 
a concern although if you have something that is very unique and not 
readily available I'm sure we'd all love to see it.

Prepare yourself if you watch Gohatto--everyone is an ancient old man or 
pudgy and unattractive except for Kano, Okita and Tadanobu Asano** whose 
character name I can never remember.

**I'm sure Sec will correct me if I got his real name wrong too ^_^


-- 
Barbara Sheridan
